articles.title: Donald Trump's tariffs will hurt global growth, OECD warns - BBC
articles.summary: Trump tariffs forecast to hurt global growth Global economic growth is set to be slower this year largely because of Donald Trump's US tariffs, according to a leading international policy group. Worldwide growth is now expected to slow to a "modest" 2. 9%, down from a previous forecast of 3. 1%, said the Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD).
